refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: cert8.db is an NSS certificate database.
This certificate database is in the legacy database format. Consider migrating to cert9.db and key4.db which are the new sqlite-based shared database format with support for concurrent access.

refsection.title: Authors
refsection.para: The nss libraries were written and maintained by developers with Netscape, Red Hat, Sun, Oracle, Mozilla, and Google.
